moves.1. d4 b6 2. c4 g6 3. Nc3 Bb7: an iregular opening. in my opinion it cant be good for black...
moves.4. Nf3 Bg7 5. g3 Nf6 6. Bg2 d6: black is developing his tools very slowly. white has a great space to play in the center as well as in the king and queen side.
moves.7. O-O O-O 8. Bg5 Nbd7 9. Qc2: the D row will be very powerful for white.
moves.9... Re8 10. Rad1 e6 11. e4: it seems that black is waiting for white to make his move. white, on the other hand, is gaining advantage in the center.
moves.11... h6 12. Be3 c6 13. Qc1 Kh7: not one peace was taken from the board and it is obvious that black is defending and white is attacking.
moves.14... dxe5 15. dxe5: now the knight on d7 cant move and the other one has to move back to g8.
moves.15... Ng8 16. Ne4: the black king is wick. there many options to sacrifice a tool on g5 and afterwards f7 will fall too.
moves.16... Qc7 17. Nd6: also, d6 is a great place for the knight.
moves.18. Bf4: building a future threat on the queen...
moves.18... Rad8 19. Rfe1: a quick sum: white has a great space to act with a knught on d6 and e,d,c rows open and semi-open. black lmost cant move, with a bad bishop on b7 and a poor king...
moves.19... Ba8: i think that black thought that i'm gonna change the knight for the bishop. even if i gained a pawn for it (on c6) it is not good. the knight is much stronger where it is.
moves.20... f6 21. exf6 Ndxf6: i think that Rxf6 is better...
moves.22... Nh5 23. Rxg6:
what a great move!!!
it took me some time to see it all the way through. black is simply lost.
moves.23... Nxf4 24. gxf4 Kxg6 25. Qc2+ Kh5:
if Kf6 then...
26. Qf5  Ke7 27. Re1 ! Kxd6 28. Qd3  Kc5 29. Qa3  Kxc4 30. Bf1  Kd5 31. Qd3  Kc5 32. Rc1  Kb4 33. Qa3#
moves.27... Kxh4 28. Nf5+:
another great move!!!
without a rook and a knight, white is won and black is lost.
moves.28... Rxf5 29. Qxf5 Qg7+:
maybe:
29... Rxd1  30. Bxd1 Nf6 31. fxe5 was better, but it would only make black suffer longer.
moves.30. Kh2 Rxd1 31. Qh5#:
a nice end for a great game.
any comments will be in place. enjoy.
